subject: Table Tennis
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: At age 16, Ariel Hsing nearly upset the Olympics’ No. 2 seed, but she may soon have to decide whether to continue table tennis at the highest level or pursue a college education.
snippet: At age 16, Ariel Hsing nearly upset the Olympics’ No. 2 seed, but she may soon have to decide whether to continue table tennis at the highest level or pursue a college education.
